name: Ace
description: +2 to Boating, Driving, Piloting; may make soak rolls for vehicle at -2

name: Acrobat
description: +2 to nimbleness-based Agility rolls; +1 Parry if unencumbered

name: Alertness*
description: +2 Notice

name: Ambidextrous*
description: Ignore -2 penalty for using off-hand

name: Arcane Background*
description: Allows access to supernatural powers

name: Arcane Resistance*
description: Armor 2 vs. magic, +2 to resist powers

name: Imp. Arcane Res
description: Armor 4 vs. magic, +4 to resist magic effects

name: Attractive*
description: Charisma +2

name: Very Attractive*
description: Charisma +4

name: Beast Bond
description: Character may spend bennies for his animals

name: Beast Master
description: You gain an animal companion

name: Berserk*
description: After suffering a wound, your hero must make a Smarts roll or go berserk

name: Block
description: Parry +1

name: Improved Block
description: Parry +2

name: Brawny*
description: Toughness +1; load limit is 8 x Str

name: Champion
description: +2 damage / Toughness vs. supernatural evil

name: Charismatic
description: Charisma +2

name: Combat Reflexes
description: +2 to recover from being Shaken

name: Command
description: +1 to troops recovering from being Shaken

name: Common Bond+
description: May give bennies to companions

name: Connections
description: Call upon powerful friends

name: Danger Sense
description: Notice at -2 to detect surprise attacks/danger

name: Dead Shot+
description: Double ranged damage when dealt Joker

name: Dodge
description: -1 to be hit with ranged attacks

name: Improved Dodge
description: -2 to be hit with ranged attacks

name: Fast Healer*
description: +2 to natural healing rolls

name: Fervor
description: +1 melee damage to troops in command

name: First Strike
description: May attack one foe who moves adjacent

name: Imp. First Strike
description: May attack every foe who moves adjacent

name: Fleet-Footed
description: +2 Pace, d10 running die instead of d6

name: Florentine
description: +1 vs. foes with single weapon and no shield; ignore 1 point of gang up bonus

name: Followers+
description: Attract 5 henchmen

name: Frenzy
description: 1 extra Fighting attack at -2

name: Imp. Frenzy
description: As above but no penalty

name: Gadgeteer
description: May “jury-rig” a device once per game session
prerequisite: Arcane Backgroud (Weird Science), Weird Science d6

name: Giant Killer
description: +1d6 damage when attacking large creatures

name: Hard to Kill+
description: Ignore wound penalties for Vigor rolls made on the Knockout or Injury tables

name: Harder to Kill
description: 50% chance of surviving “death”

name: Healer
description: +2 Healing

name: Hold the Line!
description: Troops have +1 Toughness

name: Holy/Unholy Warrior
description: Call upon your chosen deity to repulse evil creatures

name: Inspire
description: +1 to Spirit rolls of all troops in command

name: Investigator
description: +2 Investigation and Streetwise
prerequisite: Smarts d8, Investigation d8, Streetwise d8

name: Jack-of-all-Trades
description: No -2 for unskilled Smarts based attempts

name: Level Headed
description: Act on best of two cards in combat

name: Imp. Level Headed
description: Act on best of three cards in combat

name: Luck*
description: +1 benny per session

name: Great Luck*
description: +2 bennies per session

name: Marksman
description: Aim maneuver (+2 Shooting) if hero does not move

name: McGyver
description: May improvise temporary gadgets
prerequisite: Smarts d6, Repair d6, Notice d8

name: Mentalist
description: +2 to any opposed Psionics roll

name: Mighty Blow+
description: Double melee damage when dealt Joker

name: Mr. Fix It
description: +2 to Repair rolls, 1/2 Repair time with raise

name: Natural Leader
description: Leader may give bennies to troops in command

name: Nerves of Steel+
description: Ignore 1 point of wound penalties

name: Imp. Nerves of Steel
description: Ignore 2 points of wound penalties

name: New Power
description: Character gains 2 new powers

name: Noble*
description: Rich; +2 Charisma; Status and wealth

name: No Mercy
description: May spend bennies on damage rolls

name: Power Points
description: +5 Power Points, once per rank only

name: Power Surge+
description: Recover 10 Power Points when dealt a Joker in combat

name: Professional
description: Trait becomes d12+1

name: Expert
description: Trait becomes d12+2

name: Master+
description: Wild Die is d10 for one Trait

name: Quick*
description: Discard draw of 5 or less for new card

name: Quick Draw
description: May draw weapon as a free action

name: Rapid Recharge
description: Recover 10 Power Points per hour.

name: Imp. Rapid Recharge
description: Recover 20 Power Points per hour.

name: Rich
description: 3x starting funds, $75K annual salary

name: Filthy Rich
description: 5x starting funds, $250K annual salary

name: Rock and Roll!
description: Ignore full-auto penalty if shooter doesn’t move

name: Scholar
description: +2 to two different Knowledge skills

name: Sidekick+
description: Character gains a Novice WC sidekick

name: Soul Drain
description: Recover 5 Power Points for a level of Fatigue.

name: Steady Hands
description: Ignore unstable platform penalty

name: Sweep
description: Attack all adjacent foes at -2

name: Imp. Sweep
description: As above but with no penalty

name: Strong Willed
description: +2 Intimidation and Taunt, +2 to resist

name: Thief
description: +2 Climb, Lockpick, Stealth, or to disarm traps
prerequisite: Agility d8, Climb d6, Lockpick d6, Stealth d8

name: Tough as Nails
description: Toughness +1

name: Imp. Tough as Nails
description: Toughness +2

name: Trademark Weapon
description: +1 Fighting or Shooting with particular weapon

name: Imp. Tr. Weapon
description: +2 Fighting or Shooting with particular weapon

name: Two-Fisted
description: May attack with a weapon in each hand without multi-action penalty.

name: Weapon Master
description: Parry +1

name: Master of Arms
description: Parry +2

name: Wizard
description: Each raise reduces cost of spell by 1 point

name: Woodsman
description: +2 Tracking Survival, and Stealth
prerequisite: Spirit d6, Survival d8, Tracking d8

name: Extra Effort
description: Increase Focus by +1 for 1 Power Point or +2 for 3 Power Points

name: Artificer
description: Allows user to create Arcane Devices.

name: Channeling
description: Reduce Power Point cost by 1 with a raise on the activation roll.

name: Concentration
description: Shaken results don’t cause Disruption (only Stun or Wounds).

name: Feint
description: You may choose to make foe resist with Smarts instead of Agility during a Fighting Test.

name: All Thumbs
description: -2 Repair; Roll of 1 causes malfunction

name: Anemic
description: -2 Vigor to resist sickness, disease, poison, environment

name: Arrogant
description: Must humiliate opponent, challenge the ‘leader’

name: Bad Eyes
description: -2 to attack or notice something more than 5” distant

name: Bad Luck
description: One less benny per session

name: Big Mouth
description: Unable to keep a secret, blabs at the worst time

name: Blind
description: -6 to all actions that rely on vision; -2 on social rolls, gain additional Edge

name: Bloodthirsty
description: Never takes prisoners

name: Cautious
description: Character is overly careful

name: Clueless
description: -2 to most Common Knowledge rolls

name: Code of Honor
description: Character keeps his word and acts like a gentleman

name: Curious
description: Character wants to know about everything

name: Death Wish
description: Hero wants to die after completing some task

name: Delusional
description: Character suffers from grave delusions

name: Doubting Thomas
description: Character doesn’t believe in the supernatural

name: Elderly
description: Pace -1, -1 to Strength and Vigor die types; 5 extra skill points for any skill linked to Smarts

name: Enemy
description: Character has a recurring nemesis of some sort

name: Greedy
description: Character is obsessed with wealth

name: Habit
description: Charisma -1; Fatigue rolls when deprived of Major Habits

name: Hard of Hearing
description: -2 to Notice sounds; automatic failure if completely deaf

name: Heroic
description: Character always helps those in need

name: Illiterate
description: Hero is unable to read or write

name: Lame
description: -2 Pace and running die is a d4

name: Loyal
description: The hero tries to never betray or disappoint his friends

name: Mean
description: -2 to his Charisma for ill-temper and surliness

name: Obese
description: +1 Toughness, -1 Pace, d4 running die

name: One Arm
description: -4 to tasks requiring two arms

name: One Eye
description: -1 Charisma, -2 to rolls requiring depth perception

name: One Leg
description: Pace -2, d4 running die, -2 to rolls requiring mobility, -2 to Swimming skill

name: Outsider
description: -2 Charisma, treated badly by those of dominant society

name: Overconfident
description: The hero believes he can do anything

name: Pacifist
description: Character fights only in self-defense as a Minor Hindrance; won’t harm living creatures as Major Hindrance

name: Phobia
description: -2 or -4 to Trait tests when near the phobia

name: Poverty
description: Half starting funds, inability to hang onto future income

name: Quirk
description: Character has some minor but persistent foible

name: Small
description: -1 Toughness

name: Stubborn
description: Hero always wants his way

name: Ugly
description: -2 Charisma due to appearance

name: Vengeful
description: Character holds a grudge; will kill as a Major Hindrance

name: Vow
description: A pledge to a group, deity, or religion

name: Wanted
description: The character is a criminal of some sort

name: Yellow
description: The character is cowardly and suffers -2 to his Guts rolls

name: Young
description: 3 points for Attributes, 10 skill points, +1 benny per session
